Okechukwu Ibeanu bụ Prọfesọ nke Sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma bụrụkwa Dean, Faculty of the Social Sciences na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka
Ọ bụkwa onye na-ekwu okwu pụrụ iche nke United Nations Human Rights Council banyere mmetụta ọjọọ nke ngagharị iwu na iwu kwadoro na ịtụfu ihe mkpofu na'ahụ maka ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ.
Prọfesọ Ibeanu bụbu onye ọrụ mmemme nke MacArthur Foundation na-elekọta ihe ndị ruuru mmadụ na mmemme Niger Delta
Onye bụbu Fellow nke Mahadum United Nations, Tokyo, ọ bụkwa onye nkuzi nleta na Queen Elizabeth House, Machị Oxford, na Woodrow Wilson Center, Washington D.C.
Prọfesọ Ibeanu nọ ọdụ na bọọdụ nke ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nyocha gụnyere Center for Democracy and Development
O bipụtala ọtụtụ ihe na Niger Delta na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria n'ozuzu, gụnyere Civil Society na Conflict Management na Niger Delta (2005)
Akwụkwọ ọhụrụ ya akpọrọ Oiling Violence (2006) bụ maka mmụba nke obere ngwa agha na ngwa agha na Niger Delta.
N'afọ 2016, Okechukwu Ibeanu ewerela ọkwa otu n'ime ndị kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ntuliaka nke Independent National "INEC"
Ọ bụ kọmishọna na-achị ngalaba ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
